Car Renting App

A few things more...

Info

A car renting website providing the ablity to every singed up user to rent a car for a certain period of time. Only the Admin can add new cars. Each user can search for a car in the system, then check out all his rentings in his profile and remove some of them if he wants to. I used node and mongodb to build the back-end and handlebars for the front-end, as well as w3.css to make the site responsive.

Build With: Node MongoDb Handlbars HTML & W3.CSS
